publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-1838 Iain Smith: Flying of Flags from the Scottish Parliament Building—That the Parliament believes that the flying of flags from public buildings, as is custom and practice throughout the world, helps to promote national and international identity and should be encouraged, not just on certain days but at all times, and therefore resolves to set an example by flying the Saltire, the Union flag and the European Union flag from the Scottish Parliament building. Supported by: John Farquhar Munro*, George Lyon*, Mike Rumbles*, Jeremy Purvis*, Mr Jamie Stone*, Donald Gorrie*, Nora Radcliffe*, Margaret Smith*, Mr Keith Raffan*, Mike Pringle*

S2M-1838 Iain Smith: Flying of Flags from the Scottish Parliament Building—That the Parliament believes that the flying of flags from public buildings, as is custom and practice throughout the world, helps to promote national and international identity and should be encouraged, not just on certain days but at all times, and therefore resolves to set an example by flying the Saltire, the Union flag and the European Union flag from the Scottish Parliament building. Supported by: John Farquhar Munro, George Lyon, Mike Rumbles, Jeremy Purvis, Mr Jamie Stone, Donald Gorrie, Nora Radcliffe, Margaret Smith, Mr Keith Raffan, Mike Pringle
S2M-1838 Flying of Flags from the Scottish Parliament Building (lodged on 7 October 2004) Dr Elaine Murray*, Pauline McNeill*
